title: Air Fryer Sweet Potato Fries
method: Step 1: Preheat the air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Step 2: Cut sweet potato into 1/2-inch wide fries. Place in a bowl with canola oil; toss to coat. Season with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and paprika; mix until all fries are evenly coated.
Step 3: Working in batches if necessary, place an even layer of fries in the air fryer basket.
Step 4: Cook in the preheated air fryer until golden, about 10 minutes. Repeat to cook remaining fries.
